meanings.definition: A person with authority to act on behalf of a government or organization.
meanings.sent1: The commissioners met to discuss the new policies.
meanings.sent2: The city commissioners voted on the budget proposal.
meanings.sent3: The commissioners decided to wear silly hats to the meeting.
meanings.sent4: She was like a commissioner of fun, organizing all the activities.
meanings.sent5: The commissioners were like the superheroes of the city, always ready to help.

meanings.definition: A member of a commission, especially one who oversees or regulates a specific area.
meanings.sent1: The commissioners inspected the construction site for safety compliance.
meanings.sent2: She was appointed as one of the commissioners for environmental protection.
meanings.sent3: The commissioners had a friendly competition to see who could file paperwork faster.
meanings.sent4: He was the commissioner of time, always making sure schedules were followed.
meanings.sent5: The commissioners were the guardians of fairness in the community, ensuring equal treatment for all.
